column4: I'm trying to find instructions on generating an AES (256) key.  There are lots of references online to generating them for filesystem encryption, but I just need a standalone key.  Anyone know of a site, etc. that talks about that?
A key is just data.  If you want 256 blocks of random data, use /dev/urandom
You could also use something like pwgen
ty...I guess I was overthinking it ;)
